General.Name: Galiano Gold Inc
General.Description: Galiano Gold Inc. is a mining, development, and exploration company. It owns a 90% interest in the Asanko Gold Mine located on the Asankrangwa Gold Belt in the Republic of Ghana, West Africa. The company was formerly known as Asanko Gold Inc. and changed its name to Galiano Gold Inc. in May 2020. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1640 - 1066 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3X1

3.Name: Ms. Krista M. Muhr B.Com.
